last_episode_to_air.name: Awakenings
last_episode_to_air.overview: Violence escalates out of control and lives are destroyed as the walls close in around Aureliano, Spadino and those they love.

name: Suburra: Blood on Rome
overview: In 2008, a fight over land in a seaside town near Rome spirals into a deadly battle between organized crime, corrupt politicians and the Vatican.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As the fight for land, money and power intensifies, Aureliano, Spadino and Lele conspire to seize control of Rome's criminal underworld from Samurai.

episodes.name: 21 Days
episodes.overview: Tensions between rival gangs erupt while crime lord Samurai pulls politicians' strings. Three young crooks ally to seize an opportunity.

episodes.name: Plebes and Patricians
episodes.overview: Samurai sinks his hooks into idealistic Cinaglia. Theodosiou's blackmailers try to silence a witness. Spadino chafes at his looming arranged marriage.

episodes.name: Rabid Dogs
episodes.overview: Samurai confronts Spadino over Theodosiou and hands Sara a raw deal. Cinaglia finds himself trapped. Manfredi targets Aureliano for revenge.

episodes.name: Enjoy Your Meal
episodes.overview: With a brewing war between the Anacletis and Adamis jeopardizing his control over the land deal, Samurai forces Gabriele into a terrible choice.

episodes.name: She Wolf
episodes.overview: Livia and Aureliano vie for power. Samurai confronts Sara about her ploy. Spadino's secret complicates his wedding night.

episodes.name: Garlic, Oil, and Chili Pepper
episodes.overview: Aureliano forces Sara into a deal, but she schemes to turn the tables. Cinaglia plays strong-arm politics. Theodosiou makes a desperate decision.

episodes.name: Last Customer
episodes.overview: Samurai closes in as Sara tries to avert a Vatican scandal in return for the commission's votes. Livia reacts to Manfredi's move on her territory.

episodes.name: A New Man
episodes.overview: Scrambling to salvage the deal, Samurai summons Livia and Manfredi to a meeting. Sara faces a deception. Angelica discovers Spadino's secret.

episodes.name: Pitch Black
episodes.overview: Cinaglia doubles down on his political gamble, and Aureliano suffers a dangerous betrayal. Enthused over making a stand, Spadino takes a big risk.

episodes.name: Call It Sleep
episodes.overview: Samurai drops the hammer, but Aureliano and Livia resist. Spadino takes charge, Cinaglia charts his future, and Gabriele faces a crisis of conscience.

episodes.name: Find Her
episodes.overview: While Cinaglia awaits the results of the political campaign, Samurai reaffirms its control over Aureliano and Lele. Spadino makes a shrewd move to have power.

episodes.name: Consequences
episodes.overview: Livia becomes a pawn and a victim in the battle between Spadino and his mother. Sara meets a new ally in the Vatican and Cinaglia risks big disobeying Samurai.

episodes.name: Closer
episodes.overview: Aureliano swears revenge. Angelica devises a plan to help Spadino. Christian suspects more and more of Lele. Samurai pushes Sara to transfer the refugees.

episodes.name: Upside Down
episodes.overview: Cinaglia confronts the consequences of defection with Samurai. Adelaide tries to control drug trafficking in Ostia. Lele asks Sara for help to conquer the Samurai.

episodes.name: The Crib
episodes.overview: Cinaglia conspires, while Samurai looks for a new alliance and the silence of an old friend. To regain control of Ostia, Aureliano becomes ruthless.

episodes.name: It's War
episodes.overview: New alliances are born and the old ones disintegrate, while the blood flows and the tensions in the drug trafficking environments push Ostia towards a war.

episodes.name: Saints Peter and Paul
episodes.overview: After the outbreak of violence, Cinaglia reinforces the commitment to his bloodthirsty plan. Aureliano and Spadino reach an agreement and Lele faces the wrath of Samurai.

episodes.name: Tell Me the Truth
episodes.overview: As the elections approach and Samurai loses power, Aureliano asks Nadia for help. Spadino is blackmailed and Lele makes a fateful choice.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As the fight for land, money and power intensifies, Aureliano, Spadino and Lele conspire to seize control of Rome's criminal underworld from Samurai.

episodes.name: Jubilee
episodes.overview: Samurai, Cinaglia and Badali scheme to cash in on the Vatican's Jubilee celebration while Spadino forms a chilling plan to pull Cinaglia's strings.

episodes.name: Torture
episodes.overview: Ambitious for yet more power, Aureliano and Spadino consolidate control of their alliance and turn their eyes to new turf: north Rome.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: Spadino faces a renewed threat to his power. Cinaglia tries to back Cardinal Nascari into a corner. Nadia and Angelica learn the ropes in north Rome.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the shooting, Aureliano and Spadino scramble to salvage their alliance. Cardinal Nascari tries to break Cinaglia's grip on him.

episodes.name: Brothers
episodes.overview: Discovering the truth, Spadino sets himself on a collision course with Manfredi. Alice comes to a fraught decision about Cinaglia.

episodes.name: Awakenings
episodes.overview: Violence escalates out of control and lives are destroyed as the walls close in around Aureliano, Spadino and those they love.
